CustomField.description: Enable Rollbacks for any Deployments/Promotions have this Environment as destination. Rollbacks will be available for Deployments/Promotions created after this feature is enabled
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enable Rollbacks for any Deployments/Promotions have this Environment as destination. Rollbacks will be available for Deployments/Promotions created after this feature is enabled
CustomField.label: Enable Rollback
